title: CRAB & PASTA PRIMAVERA
directions: Melt butter in oil. Add zucchini and saute until golden. Add mushrooms and peas and cook until peas are no longer frozen. Reduce heat to medium.
Melt butter in skillet with vegetables. Stir in cream, cheese, basil, and pepper. Put in bowl, set aside.
Separate crab into pieces. Simmer in a small amount of water until heated. Mix crab with vegetables and toss with pasta.
